document.full_text: an insurgent killed two people in the afghan defense ministry on monday in the third attack on security installations in four days, with the violence likely to raise questions about military transition plans due to start this year.
document.title: insurgent strike inside afghan defense ministry, 2 dead
lines_and_colors: an insurgent killed two people in the afghan defense ministry on monday in the third attack on security installations in four days, with the violence likely to raise questions about military transition plans due to start this year.
